transforms.code:
host = self.session.props.host
	ip = system.db.runPrepQuery('SELECT eqPath FROM smarttvs_config where hostname = ?',[host])
	if ip.getRowCount() !=0:
		eqPath = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(ip)[0]['eqPath']
	else:
		eqPath = 'MINIPAK_POLYBOL\\Colombia\\1100_ROTOGRABADO\\RO6'
	#self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexContainer_Charts").getChild("FlexContainer_Top").getChild("IP").props.text = clientIP
	
	
	#eqPath = 'MINIPAK_POLYBOL\Colombia\\1100_ROTOGRABADO\RO2'
	#query = 'select eqPath from smarttvs_config where hostname= ?'
	#data = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[device_ip])
	#if data.getRowCount() > 0:
	#	eqPath = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)[0]['eqPath']
	self.params.eqPath = eqPath
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh')
	return eqPath

split = value.split("\\")[2]
	code = split.split("_")[0]
	
	if code == '1100':
		planta = "MINIPAK"
	elif code == '2100':
		planta = "POLYBOL"
	else:
		planta = "-"
		
	split = value.split("_")[2]
	area = split.split("\\")[0]
	return planta+' - '+area

tagPath = value + "Work Order"
	tagValue = system.tag.read(tagPath).value
	return tagValue

tagPath = value + "Product Code"
	tagValue = system.tag.read(tagPath).value
	return tagValue

config.script:
import socket
	device_ip = socket.gethostbyname(socket.gethostname())
	device_ip = device_ip.replace("'","")
	eqPath = 'MINIPAK_POLYBOL\Colombia\1100_ROTOGRABADO\RO2'
	query = 'select eqPath from smarttvs_config where hostname= ?'
	data = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[device_ip])
	if data.getRowCount() > 0:
		eqPath = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)[0]['eqPath']
	self.view.params.eqPath = eqPath
	system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh')

transforms.code:
path = (self.view.custom.defaultPath)+'PLC/Velocidad.value'
	endDates = system.date.now()
	startDates = system.date.addHours(endDates,-8)
	data = system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths = [path],startDate = startDates,endDate = endDates)
	#data =system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[path], startDate=startDates, endDate=endDates, returnSize=-1)
	data =system.tag.queryTagHistory(paths=[path],rangeHours=-8,returnSize=200,aggregationMode="Average", returnFormat='Wide',columnNames=["t_stamp","Velocidad"])
	return data

messageHandlers.script:
# implement your handler here
	#analysis_setting = system.mes.analysis.createMESAnalysisSettings("quality_setting")
	analysis_setting = '_produccion_hora_performance'
	#datapoints = [
	#			"Hour Interval",
	#			"OEE Outfeed Count",
	#			"Line Target Count",
	#			"OEE Performance"
	#			]
	#analysis_setting.setDataPoints(datapoints)
	#analysis_setting.addParameter('eqPath')
	#analysis_setting.setFilterExpression("Equipment Path = @eqPath")
	#analysis_setting.setGroupBy("Hour Interval")
	 
	start_date = self.view.params.startDate
	end_date = self.view.params.endDate
	params = {'eqPath':self.view.params.eqPath}
	data =  system.mes.analysis.executeAnalysis(start_date, end_date, analysis_setting, params).getDataset()
	pyData = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)
	dic = []
	actualHour = system.date.now()
	for row in pyData:
		if row['Hour Interval'] < actualHour:
			temp = {'Hour': row['Hour Interval'],u'Production':row['OEE Outfeed Count'],'Objetivo':row['Outfeed Standard Count'],'Eficiencia':(row['OEE Performance'])*100}
		else:
			temp = {'Hour': row['Hour Interval'],u'Production':row['OEE Outfeed Count'],'Objetivo':row['Outfeed Standard Count'],'Eficiencia':0}
		dic.append(temp)
	self.props.dataSources.Data = dic

	#analysis_setting = system.mes.analysis.createMESAnalysisSettings("quality_setting")
	if 0:
		analysis_setting = '_disponibilidad_hora_stack'
		datapoints = [
					"Hour Interval",
					"OEE Outfeed Count",
					"Line Target Count",
					"OEE Performance"
					]
		#analysis_setting.setDataPoints(datapoints)
		#analysis_setting.addParameter('eqPath')

		#analysis_setting.setGroupBy("Hour Interval")
		 
		start_date = self.view.params.startDate
		end_date = self.view.params.endDate
		params = {'eqPath':self.view.params.eqPath}
		data =  system.mes.analysis.executeAnalysis(start_date, end_date, analysis_setting, params).getDataset()
		pyData = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)
		
		dic = []
		actualHour = system.date.now()
		for row in pyData:
			if row['Hour Interval'] < actualHour:
				temp = {'Hour': row['Hour Interval'],u'Tiempo Productivo':row['Runtime'],'Paro Planeado':row['Planned Downtime'],'Paro No Planeado':row['Unplanned Downtime'],'Disponibilidad':(row['OEE Availability'])*100}
			else:
				temp = {'Hour': row['Hour Interval'],u'Tiempo Productivo':0,'Paro Planeado':row['Planned Downtime'],'Paro No Planeado':row['Unplanned Downtime'],'Disponibilidad':0}
			dic.append(temp)
		self.props.dataSources.Data = dic

analysis_setting = '_disponibilidad_hora_stack'
	datapoints = [
				"Hour Interval",
				"OEE Outfeed Count",
				"Line Target Count",
				"OEE Performance"
				]
	#analysis_setting.setDataPoints(datapoints)
	#analysis_setting.addParameter('eqPath')
	#analysis_setting.setFilterExpression("Equipment Path = @eqPath")
	#analysis_setting.setGroupBy("Hour Interval")
	 
	start_date = self.view.params.startDate
	end_date = self.view.params.endDate
	params = {'eqPath':self.view.params.eqPath}
	data =  system.mes.analysis.executeAnalysis(start_date, end_date, analysis_setting, params).getDataset()
	pyData = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(data)
	
	dic = []
	actualHour = system.date.now()
	for row in pyData:
		if row['Hour Interval'] < actualHour:
			temp = {'Hour': row['Hour Interval'],u'Tiempo_Productivo':row['Runtime'],'Paro_Planeado':row['Planned Downtime'],'Paro_No_Planeado':row['Unplanned Downtime'],'Disponibilidad':(row['OEE Availability'])*100}
		else:
			temp = {'Hour': row['Hour Interval'],u'Tiempo_Productivo':0,'Paro_Planeado':row['Planned Downtime'],'Paro_No_Planeado':row['Unplanned Downtime'],'Disponibilidad':0}
		dic.append(temp)
	self.parent.parent.getChild("XYChart").props.dataSources.Data = dic
